title: List Contact Requests
description: List Contact Requests. This operation is used to get the collection of contact requests.

q.description: Query string built as per the SCIM standards that helps to search entered string across profile request properties.

offset.description: This field determines the offset/starting index from which data to be fetched.

limit.description: This is the field to determine number of records to be fetched per REST call.

sort.description: This field determines the sort order of the list to be fetched.
